definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: They became close friends and lived together from sophomore year until their graduation in 2004, Travis' sister, Ryan Manion-Borek, told CNN.
sentences.chinese: 從大二開始一直到2004年畢業時，兩人都是室友。

sentences.english: Actually sophomore Yang and big 3 this world essentially no difference.
sentences.chinese: 其實大二陽和大三陽本質上沒有什麼區別。

sentences.english: I remember I met a student of grade two in a meeting in our business school.
sentences.chinese: 記得在一次學院的開會中，遇到一個大二的師弟。

sentences.english: When they put their newspapers down and open their books, it's Sophomores .
sentences.chinese: 如果他們把報紙放下，打開課本，那是大二學生。

sentences.english: But most freshmen and sophomores will have to choose alternatives.
sentences.chinese: 但是大多數大一學生和大二學生得另選課程。

sentences.english: The only ones left are sophomores and freshmen.
sentences.chinese: 留下的都是大一和大二的學生。

sentences.english: Mostly it's a lot of freshmen and then sometimes some sophomores.
sentences.chinese: 大部分是大一新生，有時候有些大二的。

sentences.english: The team members are all sophomores majoring in economics.
sentences.chinese: 該小組成員都是經濟專業的大二學生。

sentences.english: When the second dice will give Liang Feihu feibook news.
sentences.chinese: 色子將大二當造反的消息用飛鴿傳書給梁飛虎。

sentences.english: He was a sophomore in a famous university.
sentences.chinese: 他是一所著名大學的大二學生。

sentences.english: Bee is a sophomore at Appleton North High School.
sentences.chinese: 養蜂是一個大二在阿普爾頓北高中。

sentences.english: which is required of all second year Columbia University students.
sentences.chinese: 是哥倫比亞大學所有大二學生的必修課。

sentences.english: I'm a chinese boy studying English in Guangxi University in Grade 2.
sentences.chinese: 我是一個在廣西大學學習英語的大二男生。

sentences.english: As a sophomore, I feel that the time flies.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一個大二學生，我覺得光陰似箭。

sentences.english: Alex and Brett will soon strat their second year of university in Virginia.
sentences.chinese: 亞力斯和布萊特很快在佛吉尼亞州大學上大二了。

sentences.english: And I'm a sophomore at Princeton.
sentences.chinese: 我是普林斯頓大學一名大二的學生。

definition: foundation of a University or College/school opening/the start of a new term
the Great Learning, one of the Four Books 四書|四书[Si4 shu1] in Confucianism
junior high school/abbr. for 初級中學|初级中学[chu1 ji2 zhong1 xue2]
